mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCM_XS_BigContract (id,ownerName,dealer,commerceFirstId, contractCode,consignee,phone, marketingWay,shipAddress,payType,signTheAddress, specialOpinion,YUnit,YAddress,YOpenBank, YDutyCode,YBankCode,YPhone,YPostcode, JUnit,JAddress,JOpenBank,JBankCode, JDutyCode,JPhone,JPostcode,DealerClauseId, reduceContractTime,ownerId,approvalId,approvalState, dateOfSigning,entryDate,confirmDate,entryPeople,agreementSummaryId) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commerceFirstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketingWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signTheAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YOpenBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YDutyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{YPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JOpenBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JDutyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{JPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dealerClauseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reduceContractTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{approvalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{approvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateOfSigning,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},now(),#{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{entryPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{agreementSummaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE SCM_XS_BigContract SET ownerName=#{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer=#{dealer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceFirstId=#{commerceFirstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contractCode=#{contractCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee=#{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marketingWay=#{marketingWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipAddress=#{shipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payType=#{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signTheAddress=#{signTheAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specialOpinion=#{specialOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YUnit=#{YUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YAddress=#{YAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YOpenBank=#{YOpenBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YDutyCode=#{YDutyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YBankCode=#{YBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YPhone=#{YPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YPostcode=#{YPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUnit=#{JUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JAddress=#{JAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOpenBank=#{JOpenBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JBankCode=#{JBankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JDutyCode=#{JDutyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JPhone=#{JPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JPostcode=#{JPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DealerClauseId=#{dealerClauseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reduceContractTime=#{reduceContractTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, approvalId = #{approvalId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, approvalState = #{approvalState,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, dateOfSigning = #{dateOfSigning,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, entryDate = #{entryDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, entryPeople = #{entryPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirmDate = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ownerId = #{ownerId,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, agreementSummaryId = #{agreementSummaryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
